tweets.text: I wonder if we will get a comment before work starts from one of the lead project partners as shown on the LORP website?https://t.co/QmOqIv3ULS @ClintonDevon @EnvAgency @PebblebedHeaths https://t.co/NsYmoFJkdP

@ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @StaffordshireCC @NewsNBC You promised an update from the deadline and weekend inspections, has this been issued yet please? I am 2 miles away and yet again experienced ghastly odours and bad breathing air over the weekend resulting in my wife having a 24 hr debilitating migraine. Will this ever end?

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: @DJAndyMoor @HelenVi00175623 @djlange @StinkStopthe Please share these pictures of children suffering locally. Residents need air purifiers to sleep. @EnvAgency are negligent and allowing it to happen. Please share and sign the petition to make sure this does not happen in the UK ever again #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl https://t.co/PQebyt4QnB

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Re-name the Environment Agency to Destruction agency I am sure that developers around here are thinking the same if HS2 can do it then so can we, there is too much of it going on down here as well in nesting season üò°
